Name: require_scrum_master_per_team
Description: Each team must have exactly one ScrumMaster

Name: require_valid_product_owner_email
Description: ProductOwner must have a valid email

Name: require_active_sprint_status
Description: All sprints must have status 'Active' or 'Completed'

Name: require_defined_feature_priority
Description: Features must have a defined priority

Name: require_valid_release_plan
Description: Release plans must have at least one included feature

Name: require_valid_blocker_status
Description: Blockers must have a defined status

Name: require_valid_sprint_duration
Description: Sprint duration must be between 1-4 weeks

Name: require_valid_task_effort
Description: Tasks must have effort between 1-8 hours

Name: require_valid_user_story_status
Description: User stories must have a valid status

Name: require_valid_project_budget
Description: Projects must have a defined budget

Name: require_valid_retrospective_data
Description: Sprint retrospectives must have team satisfaction
